bow: what stuff do need pregnant with my first 13 and my sil said she be throwing me small baby shower during big family trip extended family and all in august have no idea what ll need or what practical ve gotten some hand me downs but not lot of resources they give first time moms somehow 20 is the magic week but ll ask at my next appointment for more info what were things that were valuable to you and why breast pumps car seat styles strollers and what other gear was beneficial logically know every baby and pregnancy is different but ve got one other friend with kids honestly one of the best gifts someone gave us with my first was an amazon prime subscription we ordered anything we needed last second and got it within days also don forget to get postpartum stuff for you pads pain relief spray disposable underwear peri bottle etc for baby in the beginning you don need much clothes burp cloths bottles if you re doing formula or pumping safe place to sleep we had baby carrier for baby wearing and that was nice when he was tiny didn use stroller for awhile but that was just my preference when registered at buy buy baby there was pretty extensive guide most of it was nice to have and not required by any means but it was great idea starter bet amazon would have the same and searching around on pinterest gave some good ideas too hakka pump to catch the let down dripping from your breast while you nurse on the other didn know about it and it was pretty miserable having this fountain of milk dripping everywhere while tried to get my baby to latch it wasn until my baby 3rd week check up and the admin told me about it there youtube video that teaches you how to use it hakka was great by itself but after applying it properly became life changing heard there knock off cheaper brand you can get as well take look through lucie list it website that helps break down essentials and gives honest reviews it breaks down by price too which found useful it helped me to decide what was worth splurging on and what was okay with getting second hand would your family be opposed to giving you gift cards for your shower baby items are so bulky wouldn want to have to carry them home from vacation also beyond car seat crib and some clothes everything else will depend on your living situation and needs wants we loved the chicco keyfit30 and matching stroller caddy for both of ours btw bunch of cloth diapers make the best burp rags they re soft absorbent and you won feel bad if they get stained white noise machine nightlight like the hatch baby rest white noise makes it easier for them to sleep and the nightlight is dimmable and if it has red orange amber setting that better for your night vision during those late night feeds good travel coffee mug even if you don drink coffee an insulated mug with handle and lid will keep your drinks the temperature they re supposed to be and lid helps prevent spilling on baby 👍🏻 waterproof mattress protectors and extra sheets for your baby sleeping situation do few layers mattress protector sheet mattress protector sheet etc that way if baby spits up all over or has diaper blowout you can remove the top mattress protector and sheet to reveal clean one without having to wait for laundry to finish to put the baby back to sleep velcro or zip up swaddles of some kind never felt fully comfortable with swaddle blanket at night since half the time she wake up with the blanket loose around her maybe just bad at it who knows we really liked the halo sleep sack swaddle things that can think of right now is breast pads to catch your boob leakage nipple cream got the lasinoh brand one breast pump used the medela in style one it was completely covered through my employers insurance you can check to see if yours covers it too if you re employed definitely get bra that can hold the bottles for you it huge help and for baby plenty of diapers just few onesies that are easy to take on and off swaddles burp cloths for the car seat my babe has the chico travel system love it once you get the car base installed it easy to get baby and car seat in and out the car seat is also able to latch onto the stroller or comes with so no need to take baby out of the car seat loved this it made traveling with baby so easy one of the very best things my grannyb gave me was some bag balm it was so wonderful for my breasts both before and after had my sons never once experienced dry or cracked nipples agree that gift cards would be best that way you can take your time to figure out exactly what you want and need things have seen mentioned already baby carrier for baby wearing pack play long sleeve onesies with the cuffs that fold over the unattached mittens never stay on and boppy type pillow makes feeding more comfortable and then helps prop baby for tummy time skip newborn clothes the resale shop near me regularly has sales selling onesies for 50¢ and other newborn clothes very cheap so recommend not asking for new diapers my son outgrew the newborn size in about two weeks also tried several brands before found ones that worked well for my son wipes warmer pacifiers my son was picky and only liked one particular brand was given hand me down changing table and it has been very helpful also way to carry baby on your person dislike the car seat and prefer to wear baby in the store and on walks also swing has been helpful in keeping baby happy while do chores agree with all these things for you things for baby keep it simple love our chicco car seat travel system you can register on amazon and ask for them to deliver everything to your house of course people will still get you clothes for baby in person breast pump covered by insurance so do worry about asking for that love my spectra pump had hygiea one with my first kid and it does even compare woven wrap moby wrap baby wearing is amazing like moby wrap better for when they re newborns but the woven wrap is much cooler if you live somewhere hot the woven one is great because you can use it as they get bigger and it so versatile they have videos on youtube to teach you how to do it bottles like tommee tippee or como tomo honestly just buy until you know they like the stupid thing if you get them to take pumped milk early on you may not have issues at least boppy love this for breastfeeding such big help imo sleep sack swaddle my kids didnt like the swaddle but they make handy little velcro swaddle blankets sleep sacks are great for after the swaddle phase changing table with diaper trash can not essential by any means and some people dont like this setup but feel like it goes long way to making my house feel more put together can organize diapers cream etc in one spot and just always change babies there no diapers all over the house idk if this is just my daughter but she is 18 months and will fight changes if she is not on her changing table for some reason but is very cooperative on it like she knows why she there mesh teethers food pouch things god send for teething time but also great for food introductions pack and play great to have for other parts of the house or traveling those are my recommendations congrats and good luck yes when was is the nicu with my lil one nurse suggested it and will be forever grateful this is the one thing ve been recommending to other moms moms to be like ikkabuu said definitely life changing if you register on amazon they can just have the items sent to your house wish could give you precious metal for that layers idea for sleeping amp sheets pregnant with my first amp that the best idea ve seen yet totally going to do that thank you 3000 lot of stuff you kind of figure out by trial and error including what products and such work for you the items ended up loving most were the sollybaby wrap the wubbanub pacifier philips avent baby bottles and those muslin swaddles also like our graco ever carseat since you can use it until they do need any kind of seat anymore but we used totally different one that fit into stroller when he was an infant but every baby will have different preferences and so will you thought we breastfeed exclusively and make homemade baby food but my son had totally different ideas would recommend one of those backpack style diaper bags hated my cross body one have much preferred one that distributed the weight evenly waterproof changing pad covers baby pees while you re changing somehow poops in the split second between you taking the old diaper off and putting the new diaper on these catch the mess and it so much easier to toss one of these in the wash than to deal with mess on your changing pad swaddle blanket the hospital sent us home with halo swaddle and so glad they did it was perfect for swaddling at night we also bought miracle blanket which is the same purpose let me blow your mind with th knowledge that onesies are designed with those shoulders so you can pull them down during blowout my oldest was well out of onesies when learned that one just looked at onesie not all of mine have them but will keep an eye out for that when buy some more thank you again you re blowing my mind right now can you go into detail about this just looked at my daughters onesie and can figure it out weeks post and the most useful things in my opinion were as follows besides the obvious like onesies and diapers safe but really lightweight car seat got graco snugride snuglock with stroller attachment pretty easy to get in and out of cars with that being said would highly recommend before buying one to take car seat class after getting one install it and have the installation checked at the fire station if they do that in your area sometimes birthing centers also have car seat clinics where you can have them check it for proper installation extra bases for said car seat for multiple cars have one in my car my husband has one and we have spare for grandma or aunts in case we re in rush sleep sacks or footie pajamas love targets footies because they zip from top to bottom instead of bottom to top makes midnight diaper changes easier dr browns slow flow bottles for at first thought all bottles were created equal and had no idea they had different flows he was choking on milk got packs of dr browns at tjmaxx and marshall for 10 usually 18 on amazon or at target pumping bra this has changed my life pump on one side and breastfeed on the other this allows hands free pumping don know how was surviving before it got mine on amazon for 20 an extra set of flanges and bottles for pumping mine are dishwasher safe so it makes pumping easier to throw set in the dishwasher and still have an extra sure it will save me when go back to work as well milk bags go through roughly 100 bags week didn buy any as didn think would produce much more than he would need do much much more depends for the first few weeks lots of bleeding higher probability of peeing your pants had section and having the high waisted ones was life saver to prevent any seams rubbing on my incision and they were much more comfy than the nylon bullshit with the maxi pads they give you at the hospital if think of more ll edit and add burp cloths and bibs you could have 200 and still somehow run out the owlet baby monitor and if you end up not being able to produce milk the baby brezza are two of the coolest things have recieved owlet monitors your babys oxygen and heart levels throughout the night and the baby brezza is basically cup machine for baby formula good luck do worry too much my first is now 5yrs they tell you what they need mothers instinct translates those cries for you bouncer this👏saved👏my👏sanity👏 enabled me to have cup of tea eat something with both hands shower omg shower go to the loo if you can get one with switch for music and vibration even better because said pre baby don understand how mums can manage quick shower post baby me knows that the struggle is real when it comes to basic hygiene in the early days removed wanted to like the hakaa pump even bought one and sterilized it but then had issues with my supply and have never used it do leak because do make enough guess what saying is that new mom should know about it and if they get it as present then awesome but do spend your money on it until you know you ll need it yes to all these things 🤯🤯 this applies to the ones with double layered shoulders where the onesie comes together to form that if open them up the onesie is wide enough to slide down instead of over the babys head super superrr practical also recently discovered this for newborns however especially for ftms recommend onesies that button up the belly the provide double layer to protect the stomach and also are easier to put on as opposed to going over the babys head humidifier and electric snot sucker it pricey investment but the absolute best thing got for my baby months old is the doona it carseat stroller hybrid all packed into one you just convert it back and forth for carrying car rides strolling etc and it has the bases for the car so you just lock it down to go and release when you get out of the car check out videos because it blew my mind the first time saw it frequent traveler and haven let baby slow me down airplane trips so far it amazing to not have second piece of equipment you don have to haul luggage baby carseat and stroller and even if you re not flying you never have to take that second step of throwing the stroller into the trunk after locking baby into the car other things swear by are halo sleepsack swaddles the halo bassinest and the nuk sensitive silicone pacifiers and if you re up for bathtime fun the otteroo is so awesome after about weeks baby led weaning by gillian rapley read it well before your kiddo turns months old so you can start off right this is the best of common sense biological developmental stage readiness and non commercialism http www rapleyweaning com don pay for breast pump if you have insurance used aeroflow https aeroflowbreastpumps com and it was super easy you put in all your info and they just send you an email with list of what pumps are covered under your insurance you tell them which one you want and they ship it to you along with new parts every so often if that covered too as far as other baby equipment we used travel system interlocking stroller and infant seat so you don have to take the baby out of the carrier baby bouncer velcro swaddles sleep sacks for when baby outgrows the swaddle wubbanub pacifier lots of burp cloths boppy newborn bathtub seat hands free pumping bra nursing tank tops have several and just wear one plus shirt daily aquaphor for diaper rash ve never used anything else on either kid baby shampoo wash lanolin ointment for sore nipples backpack style diaper bag baby carrier for babywearing nice to have activity gym fisher price sit me up seat infant swing only one child liked it and neither one used the rock play at all even though lot of people rave about them snuza monitor similar to owlet diaper pail changing table white noise sound machine high chair is great but not necessary until baby is older same with pack play we never actually used ours at the infant stage don bother with special towels and wash cloths just use whatever you already have they grow out of the hooded towels so quickly find that they re just waste of money we loved the dockatot but know lot of people won use them for safety reasons bottles and diapers just get one one pack at time until you figure out which bottle baby likes and which diaper brand and size fit best we use the kiinde system for bottles and love it highly recommend it if your baby will take them freeze all my pumped milk in ounce bags and my husband just heats them under hot water pops the nipple on and good to go it so nice not dealing with washing bottles as far as clothes didn bother registering for any because knew people would buy whatever clothes they wanted anyway and we did get lot google what do actually need for my newborn did that and found lists of surprising things both ways common objects that aren worth splurging for and baby stuff that is worth every penny for example baby wash clothes are up charged as baby specific thing but you can find equally gentle wash clothes cheaper but crib mattress should always be new so that it is at maximum safety standards for your little one if another child has used it chances are they ve worn into or peed it for good while and it depreciates the safety standards faster than you think babies need four things at bare minimum food if you want to breastfeed you ll want breastfeeding accessories such as breast pads or maybe good book on breastfeeding your insurance should cover one free breast pump so find out what is covered before deciding if you want to add it to the registry if you want to have to formula feed them you ll want formula it expensive but as you ll find your baby may be very sensitive to formula or not this is where gift cards to amazon target come in handy boppy pillow to help hold baby during feedings might be nice too sleep whatever your situation is from having room for nursery to having corner of your bedroom there are safe sleep solutions that fit everyone lifestyle and budget small bassinets to full cribs just remember that your baby can should have bumper or comforter blanket or basically anything but them inside their crib for the first year to reduce the risk of sids so do get too hung up on the perfect baby bedding set diapers there are quite few options ve tried several of them and honestly recommend you do too we ve settled on costco brand kirkland because you ca beat the price we tend to stock up when they re on sale also kirkland diapers are literally pampers with different branding love the honest company diapers and they re so cute but really no one ever sees the diapers and the price adds up target brand is pretty good but my kid had an allergic reaction insane diaper rash from them for while we used diapers com but they got purchased by amazon and the service went down while the price went up there are also cloth diapers have used them but there million resources online about them also diaper bag transportation again depending on your living situation you re going to want different types of travel gear if you drive car seat if you live in city and do drive much then stroller and either way you may want carrier or sling or wrap there are individual strollers and car seats and ones that can work together as travel system with my first got independent car seat from stroller and spent many hours of my life letting my kid sleep in the car with my second have travel system because do want to sit in the car if you go to the buy buy baby babylist amazon or target registry system online it gives you checklist of what you might want and popular suggestions ve liked the amazon registry best because their suggestions are based on purchases and they re fat less expensive than buy buy baby important honorable mentions child grooming kit forehead thermometer scanner bottles babylist has bottle sample box rocker swing swaddle blankets burp cloths diaper disposal system now you get to decide what your situation calls for do you want full blown nursery with theme and everything do you only have space for small basinet do you want to breastfeed can you will you go back to work and therefore need to pump what kind of transportation requirements do you have etc it nice when family wants to pitch in on larger items like crib basinet or travel system car seat if you do feel comfortable asking for big ticket items like that then ask for diapers and not just new born sizes or other essentials you ll be going through lot baby shower is also great time to ask for baby books to start baby library strongly suggest the very hungry caterpillar everyday babies an abc book the quiet book faces book high contrast images the giving tree etc amazon has top 100 baby books that makes this very easy we asked for books instead of cards so now my first kid has some sweet inscriptions from family in her baby books really enjoyed bringing up bébé as parenting book and recommend it lot but there are ton of books on parenting if you re so inclined finally my personal advice is to look into children consignment store near you cribs and strollers and clothes and diaper bags are all reusable and buying second hand reduces waste just do buy car seats second hand hope this helps happy to make specific suggestions on brand and carrots choices we made if you re interested good luck nose frida instead of bulb when they are sick it clears out the mucus ton always have bottle of baby tylenol on hand when you need it you don want to have to run to the store halo swaddles so easy to use boppy pillow super useful for tummy time and breastfeeding baby learning to sit up dr brown bottles are amazing forehead thermometer some things learned needed during my first pregnancy baby clothes double the amount that you think you need and not just newborns clothes either because they grow out of those in few months aim for months clothing burp rags literally just used the flannel recieving blankets because they get puked on anyways and it worked for me trust that you will need something handy at all times to clean spit up diapers stock up on newborn and size and diapers because nothing sucks more than midnight trip to the nearest open store with cranky baby in wet diaper this varies by baby but found that my guys really enjoyed their baby swing that played music and now some things that found out did really need at all baby wash cloths they are so tiny that they get lost easily destroyed in the washing machine and found more success using regular new bath pouf same goes with baby towels just use your regular ol clean towels baby bath tub that goes inside regular tub sink kinda cute but totally unneccessary and hard to store in small bathroom bassinet you re better off just having crib from the jump they will quickly outgrow the bassinet and then you re stuck with another piece of baby gear that you cant use and is hard to store hope this helped congrats and good luck new momma check out the site lucies list she makes really good lists and reviews of everything you need for every stage including what to register for for shower lucie list https www lucieslist com the best thing got that used every single day was one of those bobby baby loungers it just like big pillow to stick your baby on when he was awake and we could hold him for some reason or we just wanted to chill on the couch with him we would just stick him on that so much easier than having to hold them all the time the nose frida much easier to get all the snot out of their nose than the bulb syringe swaddles outfits diapers in and anything else tbh varies from baby to baby ours did like the rocker too much other babies do etc never received any medicine cabinet items everyone wanted to buy us clothes and diapers but you will definitely need things like nail clippers gas drops infant tylenol gas drops gas drops lol if you end up needing section absolutely suggest getting stroller base that you can click the car seat into it helped me tremendously because there are so many appointments in the first couple months and it hard to carry baby after huge surgery wish had paid extra for car seat that comes with belt pads the seatbelts can leave red marks against their neck but if you add your own then it voids the warranty so you have to buy one that comes with it thank you thanks know car seats expire and to avoid too much stuff in the crib until he can move his head ve got the benefit of one friend who is done having kids and client who gave me few things one is onesie that says my big sister is dog fortunately we ve got good one in storage from the one friend with kids backpack person for life and this means can hand it to my husband if wearing the baby just had my second and am super obsessed with lists so ill try to cover what can right now off the top of my head for baby big necessities stroller type depends on where you live highly recommend the yoyo zen if you need an easily portable one car seat check out the doona if stroller isnt necessary for you atm it car seat with wheels until 1yr bed bassinet open bedside crib ex next2me crib up to toddler years or extendable till about 7yrs or baby nest ex cocoonababy bathtub big sink with support can do for while changing area also has options depending on what convenient for you changing table changing mat portable mat bassinet toiletries shampoo shower gel lots of in options for newborns nappy cream bath oil body face lotion saline solution for cleaning eyes and nose baby cotton buds diapers nail set hair brush thermometer alcohol spray or disinfectant wipes mainly use it to clean the thermomet when used or changing area if an accident happens some medical things natural ointment for skin irritations like insect bites heat rash etc baby friendly disinfectant if baby gets cut paracetamol or ibuprofen for babies basics burp cloths swaddles prefer muslin cloths that also use to cover up when nursing on changing areas to cover baby stroller from sun wash cloths towels preferably with head cap bed sheets depending on what bed you choose blanket or or sleeping bag that fits in car seat you have your options clothing onesies pjs hats gloves socks baby bibs my first did drool much so never used them extras musical toys play mat rocker musical mobile tinylove has take along one that easily adapts to stroller car seat bed and they also have semi circle musical one that is flexible for mama pads disposable underwear have some other necessities depending on if you ll breastfeed pump or bottle feed but if you can breastfeed maternity bras all the rest is egh not really necessary nice to have but unnecessary huh how did you pump and feed using pumping bra what do you do for baths instead filled the bath tub with about inch to an inch of water and laid them on folded towel although found out with the second that the towel is really neccessary either just keeps them from being directly in the water or the cold tub bottom if you are planning to breast feed °milk collection cups collects leakage °a hakka creates suction and collects leakage only use this to slow my let down because have heavy flow and do want to create an even more unmanageable supply °reusable breast pads walmart has them for suler cheap and they re much nicer than the disposable ones °flour sack towels not baby item but swear they are so absobent and work for trillion things cloth diapering breast milk leakage under you and baby during night nursing the uses are unlimited swear °ice packs for the engorgement days spectra s2 or s1 are great gentle breast pumps the s1 is rechargeable and portable use the spectra and got attatchments from amazon that allows me to use medela parts the medela parts are much more comfortable and easier to find and use with pumping bra °milk storage bags my favorite as an overproducer are the parents choice brand they never leak for me they feel like they are higher quality and they are way more affordable than other options learn how to freeze milk flat for you °comfy cotton panties the last thing you want when you have swollen vulva is to come home and find out you ve run out of those incredible mesh panties to find you only have thongs and non breathable panties comfortable boob accessible clothes if nursing look up quinee nursing dresses they re amazing target gift cards girl you will want to get out at some point and the best place is somewhere with starbucks and comfy spot to feed the baby if they get hungry and you can shop for you and baby °i obsessed with the lillebaby tie the knot wrap can shop hands free without leaving him in the carseat in the cart for baby bottles onesies sleepers bassinet use fan in our room to create white noise much cheaper and easier to use everywhere over noise machine muslin swaddle blankets my favorite advice for new moms is to have an idea of how newborns sleep and wake periods work at first they sleep all the time wake periods are typically 45 mins to an hour tops keeping them up past that usually results in an over tired over stimulated infant that will suddenly seem colicky removed it is also nursing bra so it has the clips on the straps hook my pump up on one side unclip the other side like normal nursing bra bring it down under my breast then nurse football style it zips in the front and has adjustable velcro in the back it stays tight around the ribs as well as strap holding the bra in place on the pumping side this is the one bought https www amazon com dp b078bpwhpx ref=ppx pop mob ap share that awesome thanks that lot of extra bases can see having one for each of the parents vehicles but personally would bother with one for other family members unless they are driving your baby around on daily basis lot of people do know that you can install infant car seats using seatbelt really easily and it just as safe chicco car seat stroller for sure we have the keyfit30 with bravo stroller and it wonderful so easy to install and use 100 chicco parent now and refuse to buy any other brand for car seats strollers my mom will be doing daycare for us and will be picking him up in the mornings so it makes sense for us plus my sister and will have babies 12 weeks apart and the same exact car seat feel with our smaller vehicles bases are much easier to use than crawling in and messing with seatbelts but that my opinion less room for error with base to click into just depends on op personal situation like being over prepared and like making everything extra convenient to each their own just my personal experience and opinion it definitely makes sense in your situation for sure especially if there another little one in your extended family who can utilize the base ve seen lot of people lately mention about moving bases from car to car or keeping an extra one at home to install if they went out with friend for the day alway like to remind people that the seatbelt is an equally safe option and that the base is convenience thing before they shell out money on extra gear
